content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's start with the rental price. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in the apartment, and I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I would like to propose a price of 500 Euro per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I am flexible with my budget, so I am willing to increase my offer. How about 550 Euro per month? Does this meet your expectations?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Would 600 Euro per month be more in line with your expectations? This is a fair price considering the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your desire for a higher price. I am willing to go up to 650 Euro per month, which I believe is a generous offer considering the current market rates. Is this a price that you would be willing to accept?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt, but if you are looking for a price higher than 650 Euro per month, I am unable to meet that request. If you reconsider this offer, I would be happy to proceed with the rental agreement at this price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
